statements: SELECT * FROM candidate_interactions;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_type FROM candidate_interactions WHERE candidate_id = 5;
SELECT candidate_id, interaction_type, touchpoint FROM candidate_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Phone Call';
SELECT * FROM candidate_interactions WHERE interaction_time >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT DISTINCT interaction_type FROM candidate_interactions ORDER BY interaction_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM candidate_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Interview' AND touchpoint = 'Phone Call';
SELECT interaction_id, candidate_id, interaction_type FROM candidate_interactions ORDER BY interaction_time DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM candidate_interactions;
SELECT AVG(candidate_id) AS avg_candidate_id FROM candidate_interactions;
SELECT DISTINCT interaction_type FROM candidate_interactions;
SELECT * FROM candidate_interactions;
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_notes FROM candidate_interactions WHERE candidate_id = 123;
SELECT touchpoint_id, interaction_datetime FROM candidate_interactions ORDER BY interaction_datetime DESC;
SELECT interaction_type, COUNT(*) FROM candidate_interactions GROUP BY interaction_type;
SELECT candidate_id, interaction_notes FROM candidate_interactions WHERE interaction_notes LIKE '%positive%' ORDER BY candidate_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM candidate_interactions WHERE candidate_id = 1;
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_datetime FROM candidate_interactions WHERE touchpoint_id = 10;
SELECT candidate_id, interaction_notes FROM candidate_interactions ORDER BY interaction_datetime DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM engagement_levels WHERE engagement_rating > 3;
SELECT candidate_id, MAX(engagement_rating) AS max_engagement FROM engagement_levels GROUP BY candidate_id;
SELECT * FROM candidates ORDER BY candidate_name DESC, candidate_id ASC;
SELECT candidate_name, email FROM candidates WHERE application_date > '2021-01-01';

SELECT candidates.candidate_name, touchpoints.touchpoint_name, engagement_levels.level_name FROM candidates JOIN touchpoints ON candidates.candidate_id = touchpoints.candidate_id JOIN engagement_levels ON touchpoints.touchpoint_id = engagement_levels.touchpoint_id;
SELECT candidate_name, email, phone_number FROM candidates WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM engagement_levels WHERE description LIKE '%exciting%';
SELECT * FROM candidates WHERE application_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT candidate_name, email, phone_number FROM candidates WHERE candidate_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT touchpoint_name, interaction_date FROM touchpoints ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;

SELECT c.candidate_name, t.touchpoint_name, e.level_name FROM candidates c JOIN touchpoints t ON c.candidate_id = t.candidate_id JOIN engagement_levels e ON t.touchpoint_id = e.touchpoint_id WHERE e.level_name = 'High';
SELECT * FROM candidates WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL AND email IS NULL;
SELECT candidate_name, engagement_level FROM candidates
SELECT interaction_date, notes FROM candidate_interactions WHERE interaction_type='Email'
SELECT touchpoint_name, touchpoint_type FROM recruitment_touchpoints WHERE touchpoint_type='Interview'
SELECT * FROM engagement_levels WHERE level_weight > 5

SELECT candidate_name, interaction_date, level_description FROM candidates JOIN candidate_interactions ON candidates.candidate_id = candidate_interactions.candidate_id JOIN engagement_levels ON candidates.engagement_level = engagement_levels.level_id
SELECT candidate_name, engagement_level FROM candidates WHERE engagement_level > 3 ORDER BY engagement_level DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT c.candidate_name, e.level_description FROM candidates c JOIN engagement_levels e ON c.engagement_level = e.level_id WHERE e.level_weight > 5 ORDER BY e.level_weight ASC

SELECT ci.interaction_type, c.candidate_name, tp.touchpoint_type FROM candidate_interactions ci JOIN candidates c ON ci.candidate_id = c.candidate_id JOIN recruitment_touchpoints tp ON ci.touchpoint_id = tp.touchpoint_id WHERE ci.interaction_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY ci.interaction_date DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT c.candidate_name, rt.touchpoint_name, ci.notes FROM candidates c JOIN candidate_interactions ci ON c.candidate_id = ci.candidate_id JOIN recruitment_touchpoints rt ON ci.touchpoint_id = rt.touchpoint_id WHERE c.engagement_level < 4 ORDER BY c.candidate_name ASC, rt.touchpoint_name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT candid...
SELECT * FROM candidates;
SELECT candidate_name, email, phone_number FROM candidates WHERE candidate_id = 3;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_date FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT count(interaction_id) AS total_interactions FROM interactions;
SELECT candidates.candidate_name, touchpoints.touchpoint_name FROM candidates JOIN touchpoints ON candidates.candidate_id = touchpoints.touchpoint_id;
SELECT * FROM interactions
SELECT candidate_id, interaction_type FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC
SELECT touchpoint_name, touchpoint_type FROM touchpoints WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01'
SELECT candidate_name, email, phone_number FROM candidates WHERE candidate_id = 123
SELECT * FROM interactions JOIN interaction_engagement ON interactions.interaction_id = interaction_engagement.interaction_id ORDER BY interaction_date
